1. US clears export of advanced AI chips to UAE under Microsoft deal, Axios says  Reuters
  2. Scoop: Advanced AI chips cleared for export to UAE under Microsoft deal  Axios
  3. Microsoft-G42 deal sees US clear advanced AI chips for export to UAE - report  Seeking Alpha
  4. Microsoft’s (MSFT) AI Chip Deal: Strategic Move or Geopolitical Gamble?  MSN
  5. Microsoft Expands AI Footprint: UAE Partnership with G42 Draws U.S. Approval and Global Attention  Yahoo Finance
